alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 17 at 9:01AM MST until January 17 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-freezing temperatures will allow untreated surfaces to become slick.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
